landing.title: Welcome to CancerPod
landing.body: Cancer Pod is a decision-support app that is designed to help people recognize when it may be worth consulting a cancer specialist earlier.

risk_signal_intake.title: Risk Signal Intake
risk_signal_intake.description: This section gives the patient the option to allow summaries to be generated their data entries. No real data is stored yet, this is a mock.

doctor_pool.title: Doctor Pool
doctor_pool.description: This section allows the patient to select from a pool of cancer specialists to consult with based on their risk signals.

ethics_safety.title: Ethics and Safety
ethics_safety.description: This section outlines the ethical considerations and safety measures taken to ensure patient data is handled responsibly.

privacy_data.title: Privacy and Data Handling
privacy_data.body: This section details how patient data is protected. Data is pseudonymized, encrypted, and never sold.

next_steps.title: What Happens Next?
next_steps.body: This section outlines the next steps for patients after using the Cancer Pod app, including follow-up consultations and monitoring.
